title: Comment
description: Comments associated to an issue or a pull/merge request within the repository of a forge (Gitea, GitLab, etc.).

issue_index.description: Unique identifier of the issue or pull/merge request containing the comment.

poster_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who authored the comment.

poster_name.description: Name of the user who authored the comment.

poster_email.description: Email of the user who authored the comment.
